columns.name: organisation_path
columns.dc:title: Organisation Path
columns.schema:description: A sequence of colon separated Organisation Keys that fully specifies the Provider Organisation providing a service to the client.

columns.name: twb_ni_key
columns.dc:title: TWB NI Key
columns.schema:description: This is a number or code assigned to each instance of a TWB NI. The TWB NI Key is unique and stable for each instance of a TWB NI at the level of the organisation.

columns.name: collection_occasion_key
columns.dc:title: Collection Occasion Key
columns.schema:description: This is a number or code assigned to each collection occasion of outcome measures. The Collection Occasion Key is unique and stable for each collection occasion at the level of the organisation.

columns.name: twb_ni_type
columns.dc:title: TWB NI - Type
columns.schema:description: The identified needs of the client at commencement or review of the service.

columns.name: twb_ni_tags
columns.dc:title: TWB NI - Tags
columns.schema:description: List of tags for the collection occasion.
